_comment: Mexico compliance norms and standards database. Includes NOM standards, IFT, COFEPRIS, SE and other Mexican regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Electrical Appliances - Safety Requirements
norms.description: Mandatory safety standard for electrical products. Covers household appliances, IT equipment, power supplies, tools. Testing at accredited labs. NOM mark required on product. Third-party certification body approval.

norms.name: Consumer Product Information - Commercial Labeling
norms.description: Mandatory labeling in Spanish. Product name, net content, manufacturer/importer info, country of origin, warnings. Applies to all consumer products. SE (Secretaría de Economía) enforcement.

norms.name: Federal Telecommunications Institute - Equipment Homologation
norms.description: Mandatory homologation for telecom and radio equipment. Testing at IFT-accredited labs. Covers WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular, all radio devices. Homologation certificate and IFT mark required before import or sale.

norms.name: Telecommunications Terminal Equipment
norms.description: Technical requirements for telecom terminal equipment. Covers equipment connecting to telecom networks. Testing at accredited labs. Part of IFT homologation process.

norms.name: Telecommunications Equipment - EMC Requirements
norms.description: EMC requirements for telecommunications equipment. Emission and immunity limits. Part of IFT homologation. Based on international standards with Mexican requirements.

norms.name: National Commission for Energy Efficiency - MEPS and Labeling
norms.description: Energy efficiency standards and labeling. Various NOMs for different products (NOM-015-ENER for refrigerators, NOM-032-ENER for lamps, etc.). Mandatory minimum efficiency. Energy label required.

norms.name: Energy Efficiency for Refrigerators and Freezers
norms.description: Mandatory energy efficiency for refrigeration appliances. Minimum performance standards. Energy label required. Testing at accredited labs. Updated periodically for stricter requirements.

norms.name: Energy Efficiency for LED and CFL Lamps
norms.description: Energy efficiency limits for lamps. Minimum efficacy requirements. Energy label. Covers LED and CFL replacement lamps and integrated lamps.

norms.name: Federal Commission for Protection Against Sanitary Risk - Medical Device Registration
norms.description: Mandatory sanitary registration for medical devices. Classification I, II, III based on risk. Sanitary license for importers and distributors. GMP compliance. Clinical data may be required. Third-party NOM conformity assessment.

norms.name: Good Manufacturing Practice for Medical Devices
norms.description: GMP requirements for medical device manufacturing. Based on ISO 13485. COFEPRIS inspection and certification. Required for domestic manufacture and import authorization.

norms.name: Secretariat of Communications and Transport - Vehicle Standards
norms.description: Vehicle safety and technical standards. Type approval requirements. NOMs for various vehicle systems and components. Based on international standards (UN ECE, FMVSS).

norms.name: Vehicle Emissions Standards
norms.description: Vehicle emission limits. Testing procedures. Periodic verification requirements. SEMARNAT (environmental ministry) enforcement. Progressively stricter standards.

norms.name: Toy Safety
norms.description: Comprehensive toy safety requirements. Mechanical, chemical, flammability, electrical hazards. Based on international standards. Mandatory certification. Age grading and warnings in Spanish.

norms.name: Hazardous Waste Management
norms.description: Hazardous waste regulations. Generator registration. Manifests for transport. Affects products with batteries, electronics, chemicals. Producer responsibility emerging.

norms.name: Characteristics and Listing of Hazardous Wastes
norms.description: Classification of hazardous waste. CRETIB characteristics (corrosive, reactive, explosive, toxic, flammable, biohazardous). Lists of hazardous wastes. Affects product materials and disposal.

norms.name: E-Waste Classification and Management
norms.description: Classification of e-waste as hazardous or non-hazardous. Management plans required. Special handling requirements. Producer responsibility provisions.

norms.name: Federal Consumer Protection Agency - Requirements
norms.description: Consumer protection enforcement. Product information, warranties, safety, advertising. PROFECO has broad authority for inspections, fines, recalls. Consumer complaint system.

norms.name: Ley Federal de Protección al Consumidor
norms.description: Consumer rights framework. Product safety, information, warranties, liability. Prohibition of misleading practices. PROFECO enforcement powers. Product recalls and corrective measures.

norms.name: Commercial Information - General Labeling
norms.description: General labeling requirements for products. Information in Spanish. Content declaration. Manufacturer/importer identification. Country of origin. Warnings and instructions.

norms.name: Prepackaged Products - Content Declaration
norms.applies_to: Prepackaged products sold by weight or volume
norms.description: Net content declaration requirements. Tolerances for variations. Verification procedures. Labeling format. PROFECO enforcement.

norms.name: Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data (LFPDPPP)
norms.description: Data protection law for private sector. Consent requirements, privacy notices, data subject rights. INAI (National Transparency Institute) enforcement. Applies to connected devices and services processing Mexican users' data.

norms.name: National Cybersecurity Strategy
norms.description: National cybersecurity framework. Guidelines for critical infrastructure. Incident reporting. Security standards for government systems. Evolving requirements for commercial products.

norms.name: Mexican Institute of Industrial Property - Trademark Protection
norms.description: Trademark registration and protection. Prevents unauthorized use of marks. Affects product branding, labeling. Enforcement against counterfeits. Industrial property law (patents, designs, trade secrets).

norms.name: Sanitary Control for Food Contact Materials
norms.description: Sanitary requirements for food contact materials. Various NOMs for different materials (plastics, metals, ceramics). Migration limits. Positive lists. COFEPRIS sanitary registry.

norms.name: Food and Beverage Labeling
norms.description: Labeling requirements for food and beverages. Nutritional information. Warning labels for excess calories, sodium, sugars, fats. Ingredient listing. Allergen declarations. Recent updates with warning seals.

norms.name: Mexican Pharmacopoeia (Farmacopea de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos)
norms.description: Official compendium of drug standards. Quality specifications for pharmaceutical substances and products. COFEPRIS reference for pharmaceutical regulation.

norms.name: Commercial Information - Textile Products
norms.description: Labeling for textile products. Fiber content, care instructions, manufacturer information. Labeling in Spanish. Permanent labels required.

norms.name: Foreign Trade Law - Import Requirements
norms.description: Import documentation and procedures. Customs classification (HS codes). Import permits for regulated products. Certificate of conformity with NOMs for applicable products. Customs clearance requirements.

norms.name: NOM Conformity Assessment
norms.description: Conformity assessment by accredited bodies. Testing, certification, surveillance. Certificate of conformity required for customs clearance and sale. Various assessment procedures depending on NOM.

norms.name: Mexican Accreditation Entity
norms.applies_to: Testing labs, certification bodies, inspection bodies
norms.description: National accreditation body. Accredits labs, certification bodies, inspection bodies for NOM conformity assessment. ISO/IEC 17025, 17065, 17020 requirements. EMA seal indicates accreditation.

norms.name: Mexican Standards (Normas Mexicanas)
norms.description: Voluntary Mexican standards. Not mandatory unless referenced by NOM or contract. Developed by national standardization bodies. Cover quality, testing methods, terminology. Certification available.

norms.name: Construction Standards and Building Codes
norms.description: Building codes vary by state/municipality. National Construction Manual provides guidance. Affects electrical systems, plumbing, fire safety, structural. Product certifications (NOMs) often required.

norms.name: National Electrical Code (Mexican NEC)
norms.description: Electrical installation requirements. Based on US NEC with Mexican adaptations. Affects installed electrical equipment. Not direct product certification but important for compatibility.

norms.name: Fire Safety Standards (NOMs STPS)
norms.applies_to: Fire safety equipment and building protection
norms.description: Fire safety requirements for workplaces and buildings. STPS (labor ministry) NOMs for fire protection. Affects fire detection, suppression, emergency lighting, exit signs.

norms.name: Secretariat of Labor - Occupational Safety NOMs
norms.description: Occupational safety and health standards. Multiple NOMs for different hazards (electrical, machinery, PPE, chemicals). Affects workplace equipment design and certification. STPS inspection and enforcement.

norms.name: Personal Protective Equipment Standards
norms.description: NOMs for PPE (safety helmets, gloves, goggles, respirators, etc.). Performance requirements. Certification by accredited bodies. STPS approval for workplace use.

norms.name: Quality Management Systems (Mexican Standard)
norms.description: Mexican adoption of ISO 9001. Quality management system certification. EMA accredits certification bodies. Important for supplier qualification and some government contracts.

norms.name: National Inventory of Chemical Substances
norms.description: Emerging chemical registration requirements. SEMARNAT authority. Notification for new substances. Inventory of existing substances. Hazard communication (GHS). Safety data sheets required.

norms.name: United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement - Product Requirements
norms.description: Trade agreement provisions affecting product standards. Technical barriers to trade. Mutual recognition discussions. Rules of origin for preferential tariffs. Affects product certification and market access.

norms.name: Authorized Importer Requirements
norms.description: Importer registration requirements. RFC (tax ID) required. Authorized importer responsible for product compliance. Must maintain certificates, provide documentation to PROFECO on request.

norms.name: PROFECO Market Surveillance and Inspections
norms.description: PROFECO conducts market surveillance, inspections of retailers and manufacturers. Verification of NOM compliance, labeling, quality, safety. Powers to seize non-compliant products, impose fines. Product testing programs.

norms.name: Product Recall and Corrective Action
norms.description: PROFECO authority to order recalls. Voluntary recall cooperation encouraged. Public notification requirements. Corrective actions (repair, replace, refund). Penalties for non-compliance.

norms.name: Product Warranty Obligations
norms.description: Mandatory warranty provisions. Warranty information must be provided to consumers. Service availability. Genuine parts. Warranty terms in Spanish. PROFECO oversight.

norms.name: LFPC Advertising and Marketing Regulations
norms.description: Prohibition of misleading advertising. Substantiation of claims required. Specific rules for certain products (food, health, children). PROFECO enforcement. Corrective advertising may be required.

norms.name: NOM-024-SCFI - Country of Origin Information
norms.description: Country of origin marking requirements for imported products. Must be visible, legible, indelible. Spanish language. Format requirements. Non-compliance can prevent customs clearance.

norms.name: NOM-152-SCFI - Extended Warranty Information
norms.description: Requirements for extended warranty and service contract offerings. Clear information on coverage, limitations, cancellation rights. Consumer protection provisions.
